categories.name: Rent
categories.description: Monthly rent for the shop space

categories.name: Utilities
categories.description: Electricity, water, gas, and other utility expenses

categories.name: Salaries
categories.description: Wages and salaries paid to employees

categories.name: Inventory
categories.description: Cost of goods purchased for resale

categories.name: Supplies
categories.description: Office supplies, cleaning supplies, and other consumables

categories.name: Maintenance
categories.description: Repairs and maintenance of equipment and facilities

categories.name: Insurance
categories.description: Insurance premiums for property, liability, and other coverage

categories.name: Transportation
categories.description: Expenses for transportation of goods and employees

categories.name: Miscellaneous
categories.description: Other expenses that do not fit into the above categories
